attributes.review: This is not appropriate for the general public. I witnessed very vulgar and confusing things when I opened this app. There was a cheeto doing inappropriate things to a child. I am appalled.

attributes.title: i hate this app
attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app i saw donald trump just standing there smiling. it was horrifying. they should have put a trigger warning or a jump scare warning or something because that was not okay and i’m ashamed to have seen it. to make matters worse, trump himself got my phone number and started texting me. he then proceeded to facetime me and started calling me fat and ugly. i will be deleting this app immediately!!

attributes.title: STEELS YOUR INFO
